src: أضاف قائلاً، "لدينا الآن فئران تبلغ من العمر 4 أشهر، وكانت تعاني في السابق من مرض السكري،" ولكنها لم تعد تعاني منه الآن.
mt: "We now have four-month-old mice that previously suffered from diabetes," but they no longer do.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: نبه الدكتور إيهود أور - أستاذ الطب في جامعة دالهوزي في هاليفاكس، نوفا سكوتيا ورئيس الشعبة الطبية والعلمية في الجمعية الكندية للسكري - إلى أن البحث لا يزال في أيامه الأولى.
mt: Dr. E. H. A. (Ehud) Orlowski, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the medical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, noted that the research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: مثل بعض الخبراء الآخرين، فهو متشكك فيما إذا كان يمكن علاج السكري، مع ملاحظة أن هذه النتائج ليس لها علاقة بالناس اللي عندهم السكري من النوع الأول.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these results have nothing to do with people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: في يوم الاثنين، أعلنت سارة دانيوس -السكرتيرة الدائمة للجنة نوبل للأدب في الأكاديمية السويدية- على الملأ خلال برنامج إذاعي على راديو السويد في السويد، أن اللجنة -التي لم تتمكن من الوصول مباشرة إلى بوب ديلان بشأن الفوز بجائزة نوبل في الأدب لعام 1437ه- قد تخلت عن جهودها للوصول إليه.
mt: On Monday, Sarah Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio program on Swedish Radio in Sweden, that the committee - which had been unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the Nobel Prize in Literature for 1437 - had given up on their efforts.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: قال دانيوس "لن نقوم الآن بفعل أي شيء. لقد قمت بالاتصال وإرسال رسائل بريد إلكتروني إلى أقرب المتعاونين معه وحصلت على ردود لطيفة جدًا. هذا يكفي في الوقت الحالي بالطبع."
mt: "We're not going to do anything right now. I've reached out and sent emails to the closest collaborators and got very nice replies. That's enough for now, of course."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: في السابق، لاحظ جيمي سيمينوف، الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة رينج، أن الشركة بدأت عندما لم يكن جرس بابه مسموعًا من محله في كراج منزله.
mt: Previously, Jimmy Seminov, Ring's CEO, noted that the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: قال إنه صنع جرس باب يعمل بتقنية واي فاي.
mt: He said he made a doorbell that works with Wi-Fi technology.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: قال سيمينوف إن المبيعات ارتفعت بعد ظهوره في عام 1434ه في حلقة شارك تانك، حيث رفضت لجنة العرض تمويل الشركة المبتدئة.
mt: Seminov said sales increased after his appearance in 1434H in the Shark Tank episode, where the committee rejected funding the fledgling company.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: في أواخر عام 1438ه، ظهر "سيمينوف" على قناة التسوق التلفزيونية كيو في سي.
mt: In late 1438, Simenov appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: كما قامت رينج بتسوية دعوى قضائية مع شركة الأمن المنافسة، شركة آي دي تي.
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with the competing security company, IDT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: بينما يبدو أن هناك لقاحًا واحدًا تجريبيًا قادرًا على الحد من وفيات الإيبولا، حتى الآن، لم يتم إيجاد أي عقاقير مناسبة لعلاج العدوى الموجودة.
mt: While there is one experimental vaccine that appears to reduce Ebola deaths, so far, no suitable drugs have been found to treat existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: كان كوكتيل واحد من الأجسام المضادة، وهو ZMapp، واعدًا في البداية في هذا المجال، ولكن الدراسات الرسمية أشارت إلى أن الفائدة المترتبة على هذا الكوكتيل كانت أقل من الفوائد التي تم السعي إليها في منع الموت.
mt: One cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was promising at first in this area, but official studies indicated that the net benefit of this cocktail was less than the benefits sought in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: في تجربة PALM، استُخدم عقار ZMapp كمعيار مراقبة، بمعنى أن العلماء وضعوه كأساس وقارنوا العلاجات الثلاثة الأخرى به.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that the scientists used it as a baseline and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: تدعم الولايات المتحدة للجمباز رسالة اللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية وتقبل الحاجة المطلقة للأسرة الأولمبية لتعزيز بيئةٍ آمنةٍ لجميعِ الرياضيين لدينا.
mt: The United States supports the message of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the urgent need for our Olympic family to enhance a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: نتفق مع بيان اللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية بأن مصالح الرياضيين والأندية، ورياضتهم، يمكن أن تُلبى بشكل أفضل من خلال المضي قدمًا في تغيير ذي مغزى داخل مؤسستنا، بدلًا من سحب التراخيص.
mt: We agree with the USOC statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and our sport, can be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than withdrawing our licenses.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: تدعم هيئة الولايات المتحدة للجمباز تحقيقًا مستقلًا قد يسلط الضوء على أن وصف الناجين من لاري نصار الإساءة النسبية بشجاعةٍ قد كان من الممكن ألا يتم اكتشافه لفترة طويلة بدون احتضان أية تغييرات ضرورية ومناسبة.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation that may shed light on whether the survivors of Larry Nassar's alleged abuse with courage may not have been discovered for a long time without appropriate and necessary changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: لدى هيئة الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية للجمباز واللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية نفس الهدف — وهو جعل رياضة الجمباز وغيرها، آمنةً قدر الإمكان للرياضيين لتحقيق أحلامهم في بيئة آمنة وإيجابية وقوية.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association and the United States Olympic Committee have the same goal — to make gymnastics and other sports safe for athletes to achieve their dreams in a safe, positive, and strong environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: وفي ستينيات القرن الماضي، عمل بريجنسكي مستشارًا لجون إف كينيدي ثم عمل في إدارة ليندون جونسون.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and then worked in the administration of Lyndon Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: وخلال اختيارات عام 1396ه، عمل مستشارًا لكارتر للسياسة الخارجية، ثم عمل مستشارًا للأمن القومي من عام 1397ه إلى عام 1401ه خلفًا لهنري كيسنجر.
mt: 1977, served as a foreign policy adviser to Carter, then served as national security adviser from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: خلال عمله في منصب مستشار في الأمن القومي، ساعد كارتر دبلوماسيًا في إدارة شؤون العالم مثل اتفاقيات كامب ديفيد عام 1398ه؛ وفكرة تطبيع العلاقات الأمريكية والصينية في أواخر السبعينيات؛ والثورة الإيرانية اللي أدت إلى كارثة الرهائن الإيرانية عام 1399ه؛ والاحتلال السوفييتي لأفغانستان عام 1399ه.
mt: During his tenure as National Security Advisor, Carter helped a diplomat manage world affairs such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; the idea of normalizing American-Chinese relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: وقد تلقى الفيلم الذي يضم رايان غوسلينغ وإيما ستون، ترشيحات في جميع الفئات الرئيسية.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: تلقى جوسلينغ وستون ترشيحات لأفضل ممثل وممثلة على التوالي.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: تشمل الترشيحات الثانية جائزة أفضل فيلمٍ ومخرجٍ وتصويرٍ سينمائيٍّ وتصميم أزياء ومونتاج وموسيقى تصويرية وتصميم إنتاج وتعديل الصوت ومزج الصوت وسيناريو أصلي.
mt: 2nd round nominations include Best Picture and Director and Cinematography and Costume Design and Editing and Original Score and Production Design and Sound Editing and Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: تلقت أغنيتان من الفيلم، تجربة أداء (ذا فوولز هو دريم) سيتي أف ستارز، ترشيحات لأفضل أغنية أصلية. تلقى استوديو ليون ستيج 26 ترشيحًا — أكثر من أي استوديو ثاني.
mt: 2 songs from the film, "The Fool's Dream" City of Stars, received nominations for Best Original Song. Studio Leon Stage 26 received 26 nominations — more than any second studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: في وقت متأخر من يوم الأحد، أعلن رئيس الولايات المتحدة دونالد ترامب، في بيان ألقاه عن طريق السكرتير الصحفي، أن القوات الأميركية ستغادر سوريا.
mt: Late Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement released through the press secretary that U.S. forces will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: تم عمل الإعلان بعد أن قام ترامب بمحادثة هاتفية مع الرئيس التركي رجب الطيب أردوغان.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: وستتولى تركيا أيضاً حراسة مقاتلي داعش الذين تم أسرهم، وقال البيان إن الدول الأوروبية رفضت إعادتهم.
mt: Turkey will also guard captured ISIS fighters, the statement said, and European countries have refused to take them back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: ما يؤكد هذا الشيء فحسب أن بعض من الديناصورات على أقل تقدير كانت ذات ريش، وهي نظرية شائعة بالفعل، ولكنه يقدم أيضًا تفاصيل تعجز الأحفوريات عن تقديمها في العموم، كاللون والترتيب ثلاثيّ الأبعاد.
mt: This only confirms that some dinosaurs at least had feathers, a common theory already, but it also provides details that fossils in general cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . يقول العلماء أن ريش هذا الحيوان كان بنيًا كستنائيًا من الأعلى وجانبه السفلي شاحباً أو بلون الكاروتينات.
mt: Scientists say the bird's feathers were chestnut-colored on top and pale or carotenoid-colored on the underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: يمنح الاكتشاف أيضاً فهماً عميقاً لتطور الريش في الطيور.
mt: The discovery also provides a deep understanding of feather development in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: لأن ريش الديناصورات لا يحتوي سلسلة عظمية مكتملة التطور، تدعى "العمود الفقري"، ولكنها تمتلك خصائص أخرى للريش - كالنتوءات والنتوءات الصغرى - خلص الباحثون أن العمود الفقري كان على الأرجح نشأة تطورية لاحقة لهذه الخصائص الأخرى.
mt: Because the feathers of dinosaurs lack a fully developed skeletal structure, called the "keel," but have other feather characteristics, such as ridges and small ridges, researchers concluded that the keel was likely a later evolutionary development of these other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: تشير بنية الأجنحة إلى أنه لم يتم استخدامهم في الطيران بل لتنظيم درجة الحرارة أو للاستعراض. يقترح الباحثون أنه على الرغم من أن هذا الذيل يخص ديناصورًا صغيرًا إلا أن العينة تظهر ريشًا بالغًا وليس مؤخرة كتكوت.
mt: The wing structure suggests that they were not used for flight but for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggest that although this tail is from a small dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers, not a chick's down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: أشار الباحثون إلى أنه على الرغم من أن هذا ذيل ديناصور صغير، إلا أن العينة تُظهر ريش طائر بالغ وليس ريش كتكوت.
mt: The researchers noted that although this is a small dinosaur tail, the specimen shows adult bird feathers, not downy feathers.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: لقد انفجرت سيارة ملغومة صباح أمس في قسم للشرطة في غازي عنتاب في تركيا، مما تسبب بمقتل ضابطين من الشرطة وإصابة أكثر من عشرين آخرين بجروح.
mt: A car bomb exploded yesterday morning in a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: وقال مكتب المحافظ أن ١٩ من المصابين كانوا من ضباط الشرطة.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: وقالت الشرطة إنها تشتبه في مسؤولية أحد مقاتلي داعش المزعومين عن الهجوم.
mt: Police suspect a suspected ISIS fighter of the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: وجدوا أن الشمس تعمل على نفس المبادئ الأساسية للنجوم الثانية: وُجد أن نشاط جميع النجوم في النظام منقادٌ من خلال لمعانها ودورانها فقط.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as second-generation stars: they found that the activity of all stars in the system is driven by their luminosity and rotation only.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: تستخدم الضيائيّة والدوران معاً في تحديد رقم روسبي الخاص بالنجم، والمتعلّق بتدفّق البلازما.
mt: The spin and the flux are used to determine the star's Rossby number, which is related to the plasma's convection.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: كلّما قل رقم روسبي، كلما قل نشاط النجم بالنسبة للتقلّبات المغناطيسيّة.
mt: The fewer the number of Rosby, the less the star's activity with respect to magnetic fluctuations.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: وخلال رحلته، واجه إيواساكي مشاكل في العديد من المناسبات.
mt: During his career, Iwasaki faced problems in many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: تعرض للسرقة من قبل قراصنة، وهوجم في التبت من قبل كلب مسعور، ونجا من الزواج في نيبال، وتم القبض عليه في الهند.
mt: 1. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, and survived a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: يعمل معيار 802.11n اللاسلكي على ترددي 2.4 جيغاهرتز و5.0 جيغاهرتز.
mt: 802.11n wireless works on 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: تسمح إمكانية عمل المعيار على الترددين أن يكون متوافقاً مع معايير سابقة له وتحديداً 802.11a و802.11b و802.11g وذلك على شرط امتلاك المحطة الأساسية لأجهزة راديو مزدوجة.
mt: 802.11ac's ability to operate on both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands allows it to be compatible with previous standards, specifically 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: سرعات 802.11n أكبر بكثير من سرعات سابقيه بناتج نظري أقصاه 600 ميغابيت في الثانية.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much greater than its predecessors with a theoretical maximum of 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: لم يترك دوفال، المتزوج وله ولدان بالغان، انطباعًا مؤثرًا في ميلر اللي كانت محور القصة.
mt: Duvall, who was married and had two adult sons, left an indelible impression on Miller, who was the story's focus.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: قال ميلر عندما طلب منه إبداء رأيه،: "يتحدث مايك كثيرًا أثناء جلسة الاستماع... كنت أستعد، ولذا لم أسمع حقًا ما كان يقوله."
mt: Miller said when asked for his opinion, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was preparing, so I didn't really hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: صرح هو قائلاً، " سوف نسعى جاهدين لخفض انبعاثات ثاني أكسيد الكربون لكل وحدة من الناتج المحلى الإجمالي بهامش ملحوظ بحلول عام 1441ه عما كان عليه مستوى عام 1426ه ".
mt: "We will strive to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of gross domestic product by a significant margin by 1441H compared to the level of 1426H," he said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: لم يحدد رقمًا للتخفيضات، قائلًا إنها ستعتمد على الناتج الاقتصادي للصين.
mt: No discount numbers were given, saying they will depend on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: هو حث البلاد النامية "على تجنب الطريق القديم الذي يقوم على مبدأ أن تلوث أولاً ثم تنظف لاحقاً"
mt: He urged developing countries "to avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up"
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: وأضاف أنه "مع ذلك، لا ينبغي أن يُجبروا على تحمل التزامات تتجاوز مرحلة نموهم، ومسؤوليتهم وقدراتهم."
mt: "However, they should not be forced to bear commitments that exceed their growth stage, their responsibility and their capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: قدمت مجموعة دراسة العراق تقريرها في الساعة 3:٠٠ بتوقيت مكة المكرمة اليوم.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 3:00 am Mecca time today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: يحذر من أنه لا أحد يمكنه ضمان أن أي مسار عمل في هذه اللحظة في العراق سيؤدي إلى وقف الحرب الطائفية أو العنف المتزايد أو الانحدار نحو الفوضى.
mt: He warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this moment will lead to a halt in the sectarian war or the increasing violence or a descent into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: كما يبدأ هذا التقرير بدعوة لإجراء نقاش مفتوح، وتشكيل اتفاق جماعي في الرأي في الولايات المتحدة بشأن السياسة تجاه الشرق الأوسط.
mt: This article begins with a call for an open discussion, and the formation of a consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: ينتقد التقرير بشدة كل جوانب السياسة الحالية تقريباً للسلطة التنفيذية تجاه العراق، كما يحثّ على تغيير فوري في الاتجاه.
mt: The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the executive authority's current policy towards Iraq, and urges an immediate change in direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: أول ما تم ذكره بين ال78 توصية الخاصة بها هو أنه يجب اتخاذ مبادرة دبلوماسية قبل نهاية هذا العام لتأمين حدود العراق ضد التدخلات العدوانية ولإعادة تأسيس العلاقات الدبلوماسية مع جيرانها.
mt: 78 recommendations, the first of which is that a diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against aggressive interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: لقد أعلنت كريستينا فرنانديز دي كيرشنر عضوة مجلس الشيوخ الحالية وسيدة الأرجنتين الأولى ترشحها للرئاسة الأمس مساءً في لابلاتا، وهي مدينة تبعد 50 كيلومتراً (أو 31 ميلاً) عن بوينس آيرس.
mt: Current Argentine Senator and First Lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (or 31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: أعلنت السيدة كيرشنر عزمها الترشح للرئاسة في المسرح الأرجنتيني، وهو نفس الموقع الذي استخدمته لبدأ حملتها الانتخابية عام 1426ه لمجلس الشيوخ بصفتها عضواً في وفد مقاطعة بوينس آيرس.
mt: Kirschner announced her intention to run for the presidency in the Argentinean stage, the same site she used to start her 2016 campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: أثير النقاش بسبب الجدل حول الإنفاق على الإغاثة وإعادة الإعمار في أعقاب إعصار كاترينا؛ واللي وصفه بعض المحافظين الماليين بطريقة فكاهية بأنه "صفقة نيو أورليانز الجديدة لبوش."
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives described in a humorous way as "Bush's new New Orleans deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: النقد الليبرالي لمجهود إعادة الإعمار قد ركز على منح عقود إعادة الإعمار للمطلعين في واشنطن.
mt: Liberal criticism of the rebuilding effort has focused on contracts for rebuilding awarded to insiders in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: ذهب أكثر من 4 ملايين شخص إلى روما لحضور الجنازة.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: كان عدد الحاضرين كبيراً لدرجة أنه لم يكن من الممكن للجميع الوصول إلى الجنازة في ساحة القديس بطرس.
mt: The number of attendees was so large that not everyone could reach the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: رُكّبت عدة شاشات تلفزيونية كبيرة في أماكن مختلفة في روما للسماح للجمهور بمشاهدة مراسم الجنازة.
mt: Several large television screens were set up in different places in Rome to allow the public to watch the funeral.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: في عدد كبير من المدن الأخرى الإيطالية وفي بقية أنحاء العالم، لا سيما في بولندا، جرت تجهيزات مماثلة شهدها عدد كبير من الناس.
mt: In many other Italian cities and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland, similar preparations were witnessed by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: انتقد المؤرخون سياسات مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي السابقة لتركيزه موارده على القضايا سهلة الحل، وبالأخص حالات السيارات المسروقة، وذلك بهدف تعزيز معدل نجاح المكتب.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's previous policies of focusing its resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, in order to boost the bureau's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: بدأ الكونجرس في تمويل مبادرة الفحش في السنة المالية 1426ه وحدد أن مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي يجب أن يخصص 10 عملاء للمواد الإباحية للبالغين.
mt: The Congress began funding the smut initiative in fiscal year 1426 and determined that the Federal Bureau of Investigation should assign 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: حقق روبن أوثابا أعلى نتيجة في الجولات، 70 ركضةً في 41 كرة فقط بتسجيل 11 من الأربع واثنين من الـستات.
mt: Robben Othaba scored the highest points in the rounds, 70 runs in 41 balls only with 11 fours and two sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: أدى ضاربا الكرة المتمركزين في الوسط، ساشين تيندولكار وراهول درافيد، جيدًا وأقاما شراكة أكسبت للفريق مائة نقطة.
mt: 2 free throws by Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, both in the paint, were well executed and established a good partnership for the team, scoring 100 points.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: لكن من بعد خسارة القائد للتسديد في البُويبة، حققت الهند فقط 36 جولة بخسارة 7 تسديدات نحو البُويبة لتنهي الأشواط.
mt: But after the captain lost the lead in the second, India only scored 36 runs with a loss of 7 shots towards the boundary to end the over.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: وصل الرئيس الأمريكي "جورج دبليو بوش" إلى سنغافورة صباح يوم 16 ذو القعدة، في جولةٍ تَستغرق أسبوعًا في آسيا.
mt: 16th of Dhul Qa'dah, 1427, corresponding to November 16, 2006, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, on a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: كان في استقباله نائب رئيس الوزراء السنغافوري وونغ كان سينغ وناقش قضايا التجارة والإرهاب مع رئيس وزراء سنغافورة لي هسين لونج.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: بعد أسبوعٍ من الخسائر في انتخابات التجديد النصفي، أخبر بوش جمهوره عن توسيع التجارة في قارة آسيا.
mt: 1 week after midterm election losses, Bush tells his audience about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: وافق رئيس الوزراء ستيفن هاربر على إرسال "قانون الهواء النقي" الذي أعدته الحكومة إلى لجنة جامعة للأحزاب للمراجعة قبل قراءته الثانية بعد اجتماع مدته 25 دقيقة يوم الثلاثاء مع زعيم الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي جاك ليتون في مكتب رئيس الوزراء.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" that was prepared by the government to a committee of the parties for review before its second reading after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with National Democratic Party leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: طلب لايتون إجراء تغييرات على قانون حماية البيئة للمحافظين خلال اجتماعه مع رئيس الوزراء، وطلب "إعادة صياغة كاملة وشاملة" لقانون حماية البيئة الخاص بحزب المحافظين.
mt: The Conservatives have asked for changes to the Environment Protection Act during a meeting with the Prime Minister, and asked for a "complete and comprehensive" rewording of the Conservative Party's Environment Protection Act.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: ومنذ أن تدخّلت الحكومة الفيدرالية لاستلام تمويل مشفى ميرسي في دافنبورت في تسمانيا، انتقدت حكومة الولاية وبعض النواب الفيدراليين هذا العمل كحيلة في مقدمة الانتخابات الفيدرالية التي من المقرر أن تجرى في ذو القعدة.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this as a stunt in front of the federal election, which is scheduled to be held in September.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: لكن رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد قال أن الإجراء كان فقط من أجل حماية مرافق المستشفى من تخفيض تصنيفها من قِبَل حكومة تسمانيا بمنح 45 مليون دولار أسترالي إضافي.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, which was giving it an extra A$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ووفقًا لآخر تقرير عام، فإن قراءات مستوى سطح البحر تُشير إلى حدوث تسونامي، وقد سُجّل نشاط تسونامي مؤكّد بالقرب من باغو باغو ونيو.
mt: According to the latest report, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred, and confirmed tsunami activity has been recorded near Pagopago and Niu.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: ولم ترد تقارير عن وقوع أضرار أو إصابات كبيرة في تونغا، لكن الكهرباء انقطعت بشكل مؤقت، مما منع سلطات تونغا من تلقي تحذير تسونامي الصادر من PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but power was briefly cut, preventing Tongan authorities from receiving a tsunami warning from PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: تم إغلاق أربع عشرة مدرسة في هاواي تقع على، أو بالقرب من، الخطوط الساحليّة طوال يوم الأربعاء، على الرغم من رفع التحذيرات.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii were closed on Wednesday, along the coast or near the coast, despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: رحّب الرئيسُ الأمريكيُّ جورج دبليو بوش بالإعلان.
mt: President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: جوردون جوندرو المتحدث الرسمي لبوش دعا تعهد كوريا الشمالية بأنه "خطوة مهمة باتجاه هدف تحقيق نزع السلاح النووي من شبه الجزيرة الكورية."
mt: Gordon G. G. Gordon, the official spokesman for Bush, called the North Korean pledge "an important step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: تشكلت في المحيط الأطلسي اليوم عاشر عاصفة مُسماة لموسم الأعاصير الأطلسية، العاصفة شبه الاستوائية جيري.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: يقول المركز الوطني للأعاصير (المركز الوطني للأعاصير) وإنه في هذه المرحلة لا يشكل إعصار "جيري" أي تهديد للأرض.
mt: The National Hurricane Center says at this time, Hurricane Jerry does not pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: قدر سلاح المهندسين الأمريكيين أن 6 بوصات من الأمطار يمكن أن تخترق السدود الترابية المتضررة سابقاً.
mt: 6 inches of rain can breach previously damaged earthen dams, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: يقع حاليًا الجناح التاسع والذي شهد فيضاناً يصل ارتفاعه إلى 20 قدماً خلال إعصار كاترينا، في ارتفاع لمنسوب المياه حيث غمرت السد القريب.
mt: 9th Wing, which saw a 20-foot flood during Hurricane Katrina, is currently at a higher elevation than the nearby dam, which was flooded.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: ينسكِب الماء من فوق السدّ في جزء بعرض 100 قدم.
mt: 100 feet of water is pouring over the dam.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: عبّر آدم كويردين، مدير مجلس العموم، عن إحباطه من عمليات الشطب عندما تحدث إلى ويكي نيوز الشهر الماضي.
mt: Adam Quinlan, the Speaker's director, expressed his frustration with the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: لقد كذب ويلز علينا بشكل أساسي منذ البداية. أولاً بالتصرف كما لو كان هذا لأسباب قانونية. ثم من خلال التظاهر بأنه كان يستمع إلينا، وحتى حذفه الفني.
mt: Wales has basically lied to us from the beginning. First by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Then by pretending to listen to us, and even removing the technical.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: أدى انزعاج المجتمع إلى الجهود الجارية لصياغة سياسة بشأن المحتوى الجنسي للموقع اللي يستضيف ملايين الوسائط المرخصة بشكل مفتوح.
mt: The community's annoyance led to ongoing efforts to draft a policy on the site's sexually explicit content, which hosts millions of licensed open media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: أمّا العمل المنجز فأغلبه نظريّ، ولكن البرنامج كُتب لمحاكاة الملاحظات التي تم رصدها عن مجرة القوس.
mt: Most of the work is theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: يعود التأثير الذي بحث عنه الفريق إلى قوىً مدّية جزريّة بين المادة المعتمة بالمجرّة والمادة المعتمة بمجرّة درب التبّانة.
mt: The team's search for the effect returned to a zettahertz force between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: تمامًا مثلما يجذب القمر الأرض فيتسبب في حدوث المد والجزر، تجذب مجرة درب التبانة مجرة الرامي.
mt: Just as the moon pulls the earth causing tides, the Milky Way galaxy pulls the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: تمّكن العلماء من استنتاج أن المادة الداكنة تؤثر على المادة الداكنة الأخرى بنفس الطريقة التي تؤثر بها المادة الطبيعية.
mt: Scientists have concluded that the dark matter affects the dark matter in the same way that the natural matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: توضح تلك النظرية أن معظم المادة المظلمة حول مجرةٍ ما تقع حولها فيما يشبه الهالة، ويكونها جسيمات صغيرة في أعداد كبيرة.
mt: The theory suggests that most dark matter around a galaxy is in a halo, in the form of small particles in large numbers.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: يتصاعد من المصنع دخاناً أبيض، وهذا ما أظهرته تقارير تلفزيونية.
mt: Smoke is rising from the factory, as shown by television reports.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: تحث السلطات المحلية القانطين بالقرب من المصنع على البقاء في منازلهم، وغلق مكيفات الهواء، وعدم شرب مياه الحنفية.
mt: Local authorities are urging people near the factory to stay indoors, close their air conditioning, and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: ووفقًا للوكالة النّوويّة اليابانية، تمّ رصد سيزيوم مشعّ وأيودين في المحطّة.
mt: According to the Japanese Nuclear Agency, cesium and iodine were detected at the station.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: وتتكهن السلطات بأن ذلك يشير إلى أن الحاويات التي تحتوي على وقود اليورانيوم في الموقع ربما تكون قد انفجرت وتسربت.
mt: Authorities speculate that this may indicate that the containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have exploded and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: اكتشفَ د. توني مول مرضَ السّل شديد المقاومةِ للأدويةِ أو ما بعرف ب (XDR-TB) في منطقةِ كوازولوناتال في جنوب إفريقيا.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a highly drug-resistant form of TB, or XDR-TB, in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: لقد قال في مقابلة أن شكل البكتيريا المتغير الجديد "مثير للقلق ومروّع للغاية بسبب معدل الوفيات المرتفع جداً."
mt: He said in an interview that the new mutated bacteria shape "is alarming and terrifying because of the very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: يعتقد د. مول أن بعض المرضى من بينهم اثنين من العاملين بالمستشفى يحتمل أن يكونوا قد أصيبوا بالفيروس داخل المستشفى.
mt: Dr. Mool believes some patients, including two hospital staff, may have contracted the virus within the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
